segments.text: Oh man, look at that kitchen disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is just standing there, oblivious, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, but she hasn't got a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good on the left side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, grabbing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward; he's going to fall and break his neck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why aren't they careful? This is so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not paying attention to any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
